attributes.action: Ensure that FCO responds to enquiries within 15 days..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite Government claims on number10.gov/uk that all complaints are
dealt with within 15 working days. I made three complaints about the appalling service of the British Consulate in Hong Kong & the fact that it had decided on afixed exchange rate.
Namely HK$13.00 to the pound but this has only been achieved briefly in last 
six months. Why no reply ?

rejection.details:
Could you please let us know exactly where it states that FCO enquiries will be replied to within 15 days on the www.number10.gov.uk site? 

This may be an issue to take up with the FCO directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
